title: I'm bored, will coach (Support)
body: Hi just your typical hardstuck plat here, willing to coach lower ranked players in support role (or whatever if you trust a support main in any other role). Must be level 30 and have a rank.

replies.body: Pretty low in the ranking and often pretty busy. But when there's time if your willing I'd really appreciate any tips

I dont have the time or focus to be coached, but i have a question, if you can answer it.

How does one best deal with ADCs that are dead set on feeding by any means? Run down lane, get 3 CS, engage, die, repeat with optimism. Is there any form of damage control?
maybe play like morgana or someone who can not only do picks and engage, but wave clear if necessary.

If they feed once in lane, just chill and keep playing. If they go like 0/4 take random cs until u can finish sightstone and mobis then find someone useful on your team to support/get vision to cockblock enemy jung. Don't sit in a losing lane if adc never gonna be a factor. Don't flame the adc tho, eventually they can be a superminion if they don't afk.
